title: Wall Street Turns to Goldman for Banking’s Outlook Beyond Covid-19
sub_head: CEO David Solomon to issue bank’s first long-term business forecast since pandemic upended its 2020 prediction
body:
Investors are looking for hints of the banking industry’s post-pandemic future. Goldman Sachs Group Inc. is set to give some answers.
Chief Executive Officer David Solomon is scheduled to update investors on Goldman’s long-term outlook at a conference Thursday. His previous update came in January 2020, just weeks before the pandemic set Wall Street on a sharply altered course.
